content: Award The **Pingat Penghargaan** (**Tentera**) (English: Commendation Medal (Military)) is a [decoration](/wiki/Awards_and_decorations_of_the_Singapore_Armed_Forces) awarded to any member of the [Singapore Armed Forces](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces) who has placed himself above his peers through commendable achievements in military command or staff work, or who has performed service over and above the call of duty. The [Pingat Kepujian](/wiki/Pingat_Kepujian) is the civil equivalent award. Prior to 1996, the three services issued their own version of the Pingat Penghargaan (Tentera). Whilst retaining the same name, the ribbons and medals differed. The individual service medals where issued in three grades: Gold, Silver and Bronze. ## Description - The ribbon is red with a double white central stripe. - MINDEF Singapore Medals factsheet page - World Medals Pingat Penghargaan page This Singapore-related article is a stub.
